paper_abstract: This article deals with the latest development in the construction of monotone high-order residual distribution schemes (RDS) on quadrilateral meshes. In the first part we give some generalities about the way upwind high-order RDS is designed. In the second part, some standard schemes are described. Then, the design of a stabilization to help the convergence is shown. The last part of this article is dedicated to the results obtained with these schemes. Copyright (c) 2007 John Wiley & Sons, Ltd.
paper_title: High-order residual distribution schemes on quadrilateral meshes
